message: Starting deployment code audit - reading real_mcp_server.py to trace all agent spawning paths
Analyzed deploy_headless_agent and spawn_child_agent functions. No deduplication checks found before spawning. Now checking update_agent_progress and report_agent_finding for re-spawn triggers.

Found 3 critical bugs: 1) No locking for concurrent spawns (race conditions), 2) No deduplication checks in spawn_child_agent, 3) Triple redundant registry loads. Verifying no re-spawn triggers in progress/finding functions.

AUDIT COMPLETE: Comprehensive deployment code analysis delivered in DEPLOYMENT_CODE_AUDIT.md. Identified root cause: Zero concurrency protection enabling race conditions. Documented 5 critical bugs with exact line numbers and complete fix implementations. Estimated 6-8 hours to implement all fixes.
